summary: Successfully tested all 3 BattleTech Forces Manager enhancements: Special Abilities display, SP Purchases system, and Tonnage calculation. All features are working correctly and integrated into the mission workflow.

design_issues.issue: 19th Great White force was not initially available in force selector
design_issues.cause: Force file was in /app/data/forces/ but frontend loads from /app/frontend/public/data/forces/
design_issues.resolution: Copied 19th-great-white.json to public directory and updated manifest.json

passed_tests: Special Abilities table displays correctly in force banner for 19th Great White
SP Budget field accepts input and shows in mission dialog
SP Purchases section appears when budget > 0
SP dropdown loads choices from sp-choices.json correctly
Multiple SP purchases can be added and removed
Tonnage display shows next to 'Assign Mechs to Mission'
Tonnage updates when mechs are assigned (165t for 2 mechs)
Combined Force section shows both tonnage and total BV
Mission dialog integrates all 3 enhancements seamlessly
Force selector properly loads both Gray Death Legion and 19th Great White forces
